pullrequest.title: Added toggle boolean in KeyEventHandler for enabling auto repeats

content.raw: There is a convenience factor to using public member variables, but through the review process for pull request #1198, I switched to using private member variables with Get and Set functions. It's more verbose, but more future-proof.
content.html: There is a convenience factor to using public member variables, but through the review process for pull request #1198, I switched to using private member variables with Get and Set functions. It's more verbose, but more future-proof.
